title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Develop a multi-layered authentication system to ensure secure user access.
description: Implement a secure login solution requiring multiple factors of authentication such as password, OTP, and biometrics. This will enhance protection against unauthorized access and meet banking security compliance standards. Ensure the system supports adaptive authentication based on device type and location, as well as session encryption for safe, user-friendly access across all devices.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Design a customer dashboard showing real-time financial information and tailored products.
description: Deliver a unified customer dashboard providing a clear overview of all financial products, account balances, recent transactions, and personalized offers. Integrate backend APIs to fetch up-to-date data and display contextual financial insights based on individual customer profiles. Ensure the layout is intuitive, customizable, and consistent across devices for an engaging digital experience.

title: Responsive, Multi-Device User Interface
summary: Build a responsive design ensuring optimal user experience across web and mobile.
description: Develop a responsive and adaptive user interface that adjusts to various devices such as desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. Focus on creating an intuitive design with accessibility compliance and consistent branding. Ensure compatibility across browsers and operating systems, and perform usability testing to guarantee a seamless, high-performance experience at any resolution.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflow
summary: Enable customers to open accounts or request services entirely online.
description: Develop guided digital workflows enabling customers to open new accounts or modify existing services without branch visits. Integrate relevant validation steps such as eKYC and document verification. The workflow should minimize manual entries with smart form pre-fills and clearly outline each step. Allow backend system integration for automated verification, reducing turnaround times and improving convenience for users.

title: Save and Resume Application Feature
summary: Allow users to save partially completed workflows and continue later.
description: Enable users to pause their account applications or service requests mid-way and resume later from any device. Encrypted temporary storage should be used for preserving incomplete data. Include application tracking indicators and automated reminders for pending steps. This feature enhances user flexibility while increasing the likelihood of completing applications efficiently.

title: Secure Document Upload and Validation
summary: Facilitate secure document submission and verification within the portal.
description: Implement encrypted document upload and management for KYC and other service requirements. Ensure files are validated for correct formats and sizes before upload, and store them securely in compliance with regulatory guidelines. Integrate automated or semi-automated verification systems, allowing customers to receive document approval or rejection notifications in real time for faster processing.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Request Tracking
summary: Provide customers with up-to-date status updates and communication alerts.
description: Create an event-driven notification and tracking system for all customer requests and transactions. Allow users to see the real-time progress of account openings, service changes, or document verifications in their dashboard. Send corresponding SMS and email alerts for every milestone (submission, approval, or pending actions). Ensure instant synchronization with the backend system to maintain accuracy of displayed information.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Logging
summary: Maintain an auditable record of all user actions and portal interactions.
description: Establish a secure system for tracking and storing all user activities including logins, form submissions, and file uploads. Provide customers access to a summarized version of their history, while enabling full data access for administrators and compliance officers. Safeguard this history using data encryption and retention policies, ensuring compliance with financial audit and regulatory frameworks.

title: Core Banking Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the portal with the bank’s core systems for real-time data and operations synchronization.
description: Develop middleware to connect the self-service portal with the core banking infrastructure. Support secure API-based communication for fetching and updating customer account data, product information, and workflow statuses. Implement data validation, error handling, and automated reconciliation between systems. This integration ensures users see live account data and can perform real-time service operations securely.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement access management ensuring appropriate permissions by user role.
description: Design and enforce a role-based access control system that defines access rights based on user type, ensuring customers, agents, and administrators only access the features they are authorized to view or modify. Dynamically assign, revoke, or audit roles according to usage and organizational policies. Ensure compliance with internal data governance and cybersecurity standards.

title: High-Performance Database and Optimization
summary: Deploy an independent, optimized database for the banking self-service portal.
description: Create a secure, scalable database infrastructure for managing portal data independently from the bank’s core system. Optimize queries and indexing for faster response times and use redundancy to ensure availability. Include encryption for sensitive data, backup automation, and disaster recovery procedures. The database should support concurrent transactions at scale while maintaining system performance and integrity.
